long_description: Next time you stop in at the coffee shop, have the barista fill up your reusable REI Graphics Americano double-walled cup. It'll save a paper cup and keep your morning beverage warm for up to 30 min. Double-walled, stainless-steel construction keeps your drink hot for up to 30 min.; can also be used to keep a drink cool on a warm day. Silicone sip-through lid presses on securely; lid will keep sloshing spills to a minimum. The REI Graphics Americano double-walled cup holds 12 fl. oz.
short_description: Next time you stop in at the coffee shop, have the barista fill up your reusable REI Graphics Americano double-walled cup. It'll save a paper cup and keep your morning beverage warm for up to 30 min.
